Alphabetic scalars are the primary units of alphabets and/or syllabaries.

# isAlphabetic

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is alphabetic.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAlphabetic: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Alphabetic scalars are the primary units of alphabets and/or syllabaries.

This property corresponds to the “Alphabetic” and the “Other_Alphabetic” properties in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isAlphabetic
